name: NATIVE HAWAIIAN ORGANIZATIONS ASSOCIATION
description: Trade Association that represents the interests of Native Hawaiian Organizations.
sampleDescriptions: Discussed parity in determining eligibility, and participation for NHOs into the SBA 8(a) business development program.

Discussed parity in determining eligibility, and participation for NHOs into the SBA 8(a) business development program.
Met with congressional offices and the SBA regarding the impact H.R. 190/S.637 may have on Native Hawaiian Organizations participating in the SBA 8(a) business development program.
